long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A really simple extension that hides every recommendations and distractions from Youtube.

Enable Theater mode on the player to make it more optimal for your viewing and distraction free experience.

If you want to disable the extension just click on the extension icon. It will change the icon color to red and you will get back all your Youtube recommendations and your distractions.

Bugs?
Found any bugs, Please report it to me on my email me@fuzzknob.com. Or if you want to help fix it you can check out the source code on https://github.com/fuzzknob/yt-distraction-remover

Privacy?
I do not track anything. This extension doesn't even connect to the internet.
